dcterms:description: A dataset containing movie reviews used for sentiment analysis, consisting of 25000 training and 25000 test sentences.

dcterms:description: A sentiment analysis dataset consisting of 67349 training and 872 test sentences, used for binary prediction settings.

dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating semantic textual similarity, consisting of 5749 training and 1500 test data points, where each data point includes two sentences and a similarity score.
dcterms:title: Semantic Textual Similarity (STS-B)
